name: day-13_signup_form
description: **We've reached day 13th of our 30 days of node and here we are with our first project tutorial in which we create a login system using HTML5 , CSS3 , bootstrap , node , express and mongodb. What's unique about this tutorial is that you get to learn everything from the html and styles to complex technical topics like perform HMAC operation on password.** *Please Note that encrypting passwords with SHA is unsafe and we strongly recommend that you should not use it in production.*\
